DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare result skin test ELISPOT assay patient history non-immediate reaction cephalosporin
DOC.brief_title: Skin Testing ELISPOT Assay Patients With History Non-Immediate Reactions Cephalosporins
DOC.detailed_description: Patients history non-immediate reaction cephalosporin test patch test and/or intradermal test . Peripheral blood mononuclear cell collect analyzed cytokine secretion ELISPOT assay
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients history nonimmediate hypersensitivity reaction cephalosporins 2 . At least 18 year age 1 . Suffering severe systemic disease/ bad health 2 . Being pregnant 3 . Patients history immediate reaction cephalosporin
